definition: to detoxify/to relieve fever (in Chinese medicine)
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: Twists can help detoxify the internal organs and lymphatic system.
sentences.chinese: 扭轉有助於提高內部器官和淋巴系統的解毒功能。

sentences.english: What is the antidote to a hardened heart?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是心底剛硬的解毒藥方？

sentences.english: Pumpkin pleasant is lukewarm, the beneficial in can filling is angry, know wind acetanilide, detoxify kills insect.
sentences.chinese: 南瓜甘溫，能補中益氣，通絡止痛，解毒殺蟲。

sentences.english: Once eat cherry attack discomfort, clearing away heat and toxic material available sugar cane juice.
sentences.chinese: 一旦喫多了櫻桃發作不適，可用甘蔗汁清熱解毒。

sentences.english: There's no greater antidote for war than love.
sentences.chinese: 愛是戰爭的最好解毒劑。

sentences.english: The key function is removing stasis, stopping blood and pain, activating blood, detoxication, relieving swelling.
sentences.chinese: 化瘀止血，活血止痛，解毒消腫。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo optimize the extraction technology of Huanglian Jiedu Decoction.
sentences.chinese: 目的選擇黃連解毒湯方藥的提取工藝。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a quality standard for heat-clearing and detoxicating mixture.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立清熱解毒合劑的質量控制方法。

sentences.english: Culpeper recommends it as an antidote for poison.
sentences.chinese: 庫帕爾認爲它是一種解毒藥。

sentences.english: Alcohol is detoxified primarily through the function of the liver.
sentences.chinese: 酒精主要通過人體的肝來解毒。

sentences.english: This herb can act as an antidote against snakebite.
sentences.chinese: 這種藥草可用作蛇咬的解毒藥。

sentences.english: He had to detoxify his body.
sentences.chinese: 他只好給他的身體解毒。

sentences.english: Do you have any antidote for a snakebite?
sentences.chinese: 你有治療毒蛇咬傷的解毒藥嗎？

sentences.english: It launches a team of detoxifying enzymes.
sentences.chinese: 身體釋放出一組解毒酶。

sentences.english: The research was to study the antidotal effect of Zn on pea seedling under Hg stress.
sentences.chinese: 研究鋅對汞脅迫下豌豆幼苗的解毒效應。

sentences.english: Is that antidote strong enough to expel the poison?
sentences.chinese: 這種解毒藥有那麼強，能驅散毒素嗎？

definition: to dissipate the effects of alcohol
to alleviate fever (medicine)/to clear internal heat (Chinese medicine)
draw out pus by applying a plaster to the affected area
to expel poison (from the system)/to detox
